channel.description: Recent content in binary on James Uanhoro

item.title: Traditional SEM overly focuses on LISREL equations to the detriment of dealing with measurement error
item.description: So I don’t listen to the Quantitude podcast. It’s really difficult for me to get into it when my playlist includes podcasts with episodes titles like: Interstellar Jihad. However, I saw several tweets inspired by the SEM vs. regression episode. And I have too many thoughts, opinions, feelings to stay quiet. I lay them out here. SEM is regression So this is pretty much established and known by methodologists.
